movie.title: Porky's II: The Next Day
movie.description_intro: A day has passed since they got even with Porky and his brother, the Angel Beach drama club are all set to do a William Shakespeare festival. They are a opposed by Miss Balbricker (the girls gym coach), religious extremists Reverend Bubba Flavel and his flock of followers, the KKK, and the corrupt politicians of the city council. After their friend is beaten up by the KKK, they are betrayed by Commissioner Gebhardt and the city council the high schoolers seek revenge against them all.
movie.description_full: A day has passed since they got even with Porky and his brother, the Angel Beach drama club are all set to do a William Shakespeare festival. They are a opposed by Miss Balbricker (the girls gym coach), religious extremists Reverend Bubba Flavel and his flock of followers, the KKK, and the corrupt politicians of the city council. After their friend is beaten up by the KKK, they are betrayed by Commissioner Gebhardt and the city council the high schoolers seek revenge against them all.

movies.title: I Do, I Do, I Do
movies.title_english: I Do, I Do, I Do
movies.title_long: I Do, I Do, I Do (2015)
movies.summary: A young lady gets engaged to the "perfect man". The groom's mother plans everything for the wedding (in a week). The wedding is over the top when it was supposed to be small and elegant. It turns out to be a miserable day for the bride and she wishes for a do-over. She gets her wish over and over until she finally realizes exactly what she wants.
movies.description_full: A young lady gets engaged to the "perfect man". The groom's mother plans everything for the wedding (in a week). The wedding is over the top when it was supposed to be small and elegant. It turns out to be a miserable day for the bride and she wishes for a do-over. She gets her wish over and over until she finally realizes exactly what she wants.

movies.title: A Boy Who Wished to Be Okuda Tamio and a Girl Who Drove All Men Crazy
movies.title_english: A Boy Who Wished to Be Okuda Tamio and a Girl Who Drove All Men Crazy
movies.title_long: A Boy Who Wished to Be Okuda Tamio and a Girl Who Drove All Men Crazy (2017)
movies.summary: Thirty-five-year-old Yuji Koroki likes singer Tamio Okuda. He is useless with women in the tradition of films like Train Man or My life Changed When I Went To A Sex Parlour. He works at a popular magazine and has a difficult time with the banter of those coworkers around. There is Akari though and is lovely and flaunting and hence desirable and attractive to Yuji and all men. With love comes misery however as Yuji is soon deep in both.

movies.title: Search and Destroy
movies.summary: A would-be movie producer strives to convince a self-help guru to let him film his book. As the guru is only interested in money, the producer solicits the help of a shady businessman and the guru's own secretary, who wants to write movie scripts (a horror story about brain-scraping monsters).

movies.title: Nine Months
movies.summary: Samuels life is perfect. That is, until he finds out his girlfriend is pregnant. Now he must face the issues that come with being an expecting father, in a most entertaining way.
movies.description_full: Samuels life is perfect. That is, until he finds out his girlfriend is pregnant. Now he must face the issues that come with being an expecting father, in a most entertaining way.
